#### 1) Term of repayment

The sanctioned amount of Rupee term loan from bank is Rs. 36.00 lakhs (March 31, 2024: Rs. 36.00 lakhs). This facility carries floating interest rate of 7.85% to 10.35%. The loan is repayable in 63 equal quarterly instalments.
#### 2) Nature of security
The above loan is secured by a pari passu charge on vehicle of the Company.
